1:
Yahweh says to my master, "Sit at my right hand\q until I make your enemies your footstool."


\q
2:
Yahweh will hold out the scepter of your strength from Zion;\q rule among your enemies.
\q
4:
Yahweh has sworn, and will not change:\q "You are a priest forever,
\q after the manner of Melchizedek."


\q
5:
The Lord is at your right hand.\q He will kill kings on the day of his anger.
\q
7: He will drink of the brook along the road,\q and then he will lift his head up high after victory.
